thread.title: Tracey Worsnop

author: Tracey Worsnop
title: Tracey Worsnop
text: My daughter bought me this course as I wanted to know more that I already did as I have deaf friends and I also work in a primary school. The course was very easy to understand and demonstrations were easy to follow and very thorough. It was very interesting to read and learn about how sign language first began and the difficulties deaf people had to go through and still do to a certain point. I thought my personal knowledge of sign language was pretty good however I have since learnt that my knowledge was very little. An amazing course would recommend to any one, even if not for work or personal it's a good thing to learn to help deaf people be more inclusive.
